food.name: Banana Walnut Pancakes
food.description: Topped with banana slices and toasted walnuts.

food.name: Fresh Fruit Pancakes
food.description: With fresh fruit topping(a choice of banana/pineapple/mango).

food.name: BlueBerry Pancakes
food.description: With whipped cream,blueberries and maple syrup.

food.name: BlueBerry Cream Cheese
food.description: Pancakes topped with blueberry jam,cream,cheese and maple syrup.

food.name: French Toast
food.description: Pan-toasted bread mixed with cinnamon powder,fresh milk,fresh egg, pan-fried and dusted with powedered sugar

food.name: American Style Omelette
food.description: With your two eggs,a choice of ( bacon/sausage/ham/corned/beef),toasted bread,chilled juice or coffee.

food.name: American Style Omelette
food.description: With your choice of filling (Veggie/Ham,Cheese/Sausage,Pepper)served with toastef bread

food.name: Cebuano Breakfast
food.description: Served with two eggs, a choice of (longganisa / tinabal / tonico / chorizo / buwad bulinaw / buwad danggit / bangus), rice and achara, chilled juice or coffee or sikwate (native chocolate)

food.name: Tapsilog
food.description: Served with two eggs, beef tapa, garlic rice,chilled juice or coffee or sikwate (native chocolate)
